urls.title: Find out if you're at risk of flooding in England
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, check the 5-day forecast or use flood maps

tweets.text:
With persistent heavy rainfall across the #Midlands today make sure you stay #floodaware 

‚ö†Ô∏èCheck your #flood risk: https://t.co/8HEpx2nkWv
‚ö†Ô∏èSign up for flood alerts:
https://t.co/4G9UCfW5wr 
‚ö†Ô∏è Call Floodline: 0345 988 1188

REMEMBER:‚ö†Ô∏è Never walk or drive through flood water! https://t.co/JoGOGP6DzU

There are a number of flood warnings in place across England, with heavy rainfall expected in the next few days.

By knowing what to do in a #flood, you can reduce the impacts to your home, family and possessions.

Check your flood risk: https://t.co/MPz7FwsWeY 

#StormCristoph https://t.co/FMPUiziILV

@NinjaHippo @EnvAgencyNW @tmbc_places @tmbc_highways @tmbc_chiefexec Thanks for letting us know about these gullies. I've reported this to our engineers to see if they can get these cleared. BW, Chris.

#DoYouKnow what to do in flood? 

#StormChristoph will bring widespread flood alerts and warnings across the North West over the next few days.

Don't drive through #Flood water. 

#StormChristoph will cause large puddles on the roads and the risk of flooding

Don't get trapped in your car. Only an egg cup full of water in the engine can stop it working.

Turn around, don't drown!
